thread.section_title: OFX Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of OFX | ofx.com
thread.title: Charl Esterhuysen

author: Charl Esterhuysen
title: Charl Esterhuysen
text: The intermediate bank you chose, turned out to be very expensive. Nearly twice the cost of your service. So their greed has tarnished your service. Its up to you to sort this out if you want people to use your service. Are you not aware of their costs? There is no point in using you in future. If I transfer via my own bank which I have done in the past at least I know what I am getting and paying for. Why did you have to route via an additional bank at the destination in any case? Strange, indeed..
